title: Man Medium Light Skin Tone Beard
description: A man with a beard and medium-light skin tone. Can represent a fatherly figure, a wise man, or someone with a rugged appearance.
apple_vendor_description: The man emoji with a medium-light skin tone and beard on Apple devices showcases a friendly and approachable individual. Apple's design language imbues this emoji with a sense of friendly realism, featuring soft, rounded features and a subtly textured beard that adds depth. The realistic lighting and subtle shading give him a grounded yet approachable presence, often used to represent a person, a friend, or to add a human touch to messages.
